meanings.sent1: She partially finished her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: The plants partially grew in the dry soil.
meanings.sent3: He partially believed his friend's outrageous story.
meanings.sent4: The sun partially peeked through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The cat partially caught the mouse before it escaped.

meanings.sent1: The cake was only partially eaten at the party.
meanings.sent2: She could only partially see the view from the window.
meanings.sent3: The joke was only partially funny, but it made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The moon was partially hidden behind the trees.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle was only partially completed, missing a few pieces.
